data.actual_result: You have the search window still open and you can see the messages in the private channel. (not jump though)
data.expected_result: The search window shouldn't still be open when you rejoin the server and allow you to see messages in the private channel through the search window
data.short_description: If you have the search window open in a private channel and leave the server and rejoin, The search window is still open
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a private channel locked with a role - Asign the user the role to access the private channel - Let the user go to the private channel and open search - Search up a keyword - Let the user leave the server - Let the user rejoin the server
